sections.heading: What is いくら (ikura)?
sections.content:
いくら is specifically used to ask "how much" when referring to price or cost . It's the most common way to ask about money.

いくらですか？ "How much is it?" 全部でいくらですか？ "How much is everything?"

children.heading: いくらですか？
children.content: これはいくらですか？ "How much is this?" それはいくらですか？ "How much is that?" 全部でいくらですか？ "How much is everything (in total)?"

children.heading: At a Store
children.content: これはいくらですか？ "How much is this?" あれはいくらですか？ "How much is that over there?" 一つ、いくらですか？ "How much is one?" 1キロいくらですか？ "How much per kilogram?"

children.heading: Asking About Specific Items
children.content: このりんごはいくらですか？ "How much are these apples?" そのシャツはいくらですか？ "How much is that shirt?" この本はいくらですか？ "How much is this book?"

children.heading: 全部で (zenbu de) - "In total"
children.content: 全部でいくらですか？ "How much is everything?" 合計でいくらですか？ "What's the total?"

children.heading: 一つ/一個 (hitotsu/ikko) - "Per one"
children.content: 一つ、いくらですか？ "How much is one?" 一個いくらですか？ "How much per piece?"

children.heading: まで (made) - "Up to"
children.content: いくらまで出せますか？ "How much can you pay (up to)?" いくらまで安くなりますか？ "How cheap can it get?"

children.heading: Specific Prices
children.content: Q: いくらですか？ "How much is it?" A: 1000円です "It's 1000 yen" A: 500円です "It's 500 yen" A: 3万円です "It's 30,000 yen"

children.heading: With Counters
children.content: 100円です "It's 100 yen" 1ドルです "It's 1 dollar" 50ユーロです "It's 50 euros"

children.heading: Example 1: Shopping
children.content: A: すみません、これはいくらですか？ "Excuse me, how much is this?" B: 2000円です "It's 2000 yen" A: 少し高いですね "That's a bit expensive" B: セール中です "It's on sale"

children.heading: Example 2: Restaurant
children.content: A: お会計お願いします "Check please" B: はい、全部で3500円です "Yes, that's 3500 yen in total" A: カードでお願いします "Card please"

children.heading: Example 3: Taxi
children.content: A: 駅までいくらぐらいですか？ "About how much to the station?" B: だいたい1000円ぐらいです "About 1000 yen or so" A: お願いします "Please (take me)"

children.heading: 高い (takai) - Expensive
children.content: 高いですね "That's expensive" 高すぎます "That's too expensive"

children.heading: 安い (yasui) - Cheap
children.content: 安いですね "That's cheap" もっと安いのはありますか？ "Do you have anything cheaper?"

children.heading: 値段 (nedan) - Price
children.content: 値段はいくらですか？ "What's the price?" 値段を教えてください "Please tell me the price"

children.heading: もっと安く (motto yasuku)
children.content: もっと安くなりませんか？ "Can it be cheaper?" もっと安くしてください "Please make it cheaper"

children.heading: 値引き (nebiki) - Discount
children.content: 値引きできますか？ "Can you give a discount?" 少し値引きしてください "Please give a small discount"

children.heading: Mistake 1: Using いくら for non-price questions
children.content: Wrong: どのくらいですか？ for price ❌ Right: いくらですか？ ✓ "How much is it?" (price) Wrong: いくらかかりますか？ for time ❌ Right: どのくらいかかりますか？ ✓ "How long does it take?" (duration)

children.heading: Mistake 2: Confusing with いくつ
children.content: いくら - how much (price) いくつ - how many / how old これはいくらですか？ ✓ "How much is this?" (price) いくつありますか？ ✓ "How many are there?" (quantity)

children.heading: Casual
children.content: いくら？ "How much?" これ、いくら？ "How much is this?"

children.heading: Polite
children.content: いくらですか？ "How much is it?" おいくらですか？ "How much is it?" (more polite with お)

children.heading: Very Polite
children.content: おいくらでございますか？ "How much is it?" (very polite)

children.heading: いくらでも (ikura demo)
children.content:
"As much as (you want)/any amount":

いくらでも食べていい "You can eat as much as you want" いくらでもあげる "I'll give you as much as you want"

children.heading: いくら〜ても (ikura ~ temo)
children.content:
"No matter how much":

いくら高くても買う "I'll buy it no matter how expensive" いくら安くても買わない "I won't buy it no matter how cheap"

children.heading: Basic Shopping
children.content: これはいくらですか？ "How much is this?" それはいくらですか？ "How much is that?" 全部でいくらですか？ "How much is everything?"

children.heading: Specific Items
children.content: このりんごはいくらですか？ "How much are these apples?" そのシャツはいくらですか？ "How much is that shirt?" 一つ、いくらですか？ "How much is one?"

children.heading: Services
children.content: タクシーでいくらぐらいですか？ "About how much by taxi?" 入場料はいくらですか？ "How much is the entrance fee?" 送料はいくらですか？ "How much is shipping?"

children.heading: Polite
children.content: おいくらですか？ "How much is it?" お値段はおいくらですか？ "What is the price?"

sections.heading: Related Grammar Points
sections.content: Question Words (5W1H) - Overview どのくらい - How much/long (duration) いくつ - How many/old Counters - Money counters Numbers - Japanese numbers Shopping expressions - Retail phrases
